name: Half-Life Gb
description:
A fan made Half-Life Game

gameboy style graphics, 8bit sound ,retro appearance and mechanics

Why this game

The idea comes from my passion for retrogame, recreating a game but developing it with graphics, sounds and mechanics of the past. so I wondered how would half life be on gameboy? hope you like it

CONTROLS

WASD -  move

E -   interact

R -   reload

1-5 -  change weapon
